text: 4:14 Jon 12:27Nɨ aghumra kamaghɨn uabɨn asugh ikɨtɨma, akurvazir igharazim pɨn ikegh izighirɨ Judan adarazir akuraghtɨ me osɨmtɨzir kam gitagham.4:14 Estan akɨnafarimɨn aven me Godɨn ziam dɨborozir puvatɨ, ezɨ mɨgɨrɨgɨar otevir kam, “akurvazir igharazim pɨn ikegh izighirɨ Judan adarazir akuraghtɨ me osɨmtɨzir kam gitagham,” an akar isɨn zuimɨn mɨn iti. A kamagh mɨkɨmasa, “God tuavir igharazitam batoghtɨ a en akuragham.” Nɨ oveghtɨ nɨn afeziamɨn adarazi uaghan gɨvagham. Eghtɨ tina fogham? Nɨ ti tizim bagha kantrin kamɨn kwinɨn oto? Nɨ kwinɨn otozir bizir kam, ka ti dughiar aghuir nɨn adarazi osɨmtɨzimɨn iti, ezɨ kar men akurvaghamin dughiar aghuim.”
